NEW YORK
Welcome to Royalton

Equestrian Lifestyle: Perfected

Those who strive for perfection know no compromise. At Royalton Farms, we have realized the vision of an equestrian community unlike any other. With exclusive world-class amenities, trainers of the highest caliber, and show quality fields all centered around a breathtaking estate house, Royalton is the equestrian lifestyle: Perfected.


Click to Watch Video
Experience Our

Visionary Equestrian Center

From our English Style barn with 24/7 video access, to our Hunter Derby and Grand Prix fields, and the largest indoor arena in Long Island, we proffer only the finest in equestrian amenities.

Explore Our Equestrian Center
Meet Our

Unparalleled Training Staff

With a full time staff of veteran trainers, including an Olympian rider, Royalton is qualified to prepare your horses for the highest levels of competition. Allow us to introduce you to our team.

Meet Our Trainers
Relax at

The Royalton Estate

The centerpiece of Royalton living. With a sultry barroom and lounge, spacious and elegant sitting room, full time kitchen, indoor and outdoor pools, and serene atmosphere, the Royalton Estate must be experienced to be believed.

Explore The Estate

Live Royally

The Estates at Royalton

For those who wish to embrace the luxury equestrian lifestyle that only Royalton can provide, The Estates at Royalton offer a truly one of a kind prospect. The utmost in exclusivity, the Estates are eleven lavish homes located within Royalton; a once in a lifetime opportunity for those who live and breathe their passions.
